abstract: For the many St. Louis residents who lamented Anheuser-Busch‘s sale to Inbev, it will be a sad day when the $52 billion deal gets done. For bankers at Goldman Sachs, though, it will be a reason to uncork the champagne.

headline.main: Budweiser Deal Gives Bankers Reason to Toast
